Class ResourceSchemaStringProvider

java.lang.Object
com.graphql_java_generator.plugin.ResourceSchemaStringProvider
@Component public class ResourceSchemaStringProvider extends Object
Overrides the
invalid reference 
GraphQLJavaToolsAutoConfiguration#schemaStringProvider()
bean, to loads our graphqls files, from the given schemaFilePattern plugin parameter
